regions.name: amiibo Name
regions.description: the amiibo's name

regions.name: ability 1
regions.description: first ability

regions.name: ability 2
regions.description: second ability

regions.name: ability 3
regions.description: third ability

regions.name: Learning
regions.description: learning

regions.name: Journey
regions.description: if the amiibo is on a journey

regions.name: Alternate Skin
regions.description: skin the amiibo has

regions.name: Spirit Type
regions.description: amiibo spirit type

regions.name: Attack Stat
regions.description: attack stat of the amiibo

regions.name: Defense Stat
regions.description: defense stat of the amiibo

regions.name: Level Experience
regions.description: the amount of level exp an amiibo has

regions.name: CPU Experience
regions.description: the amount of cpu exp an amiibo has

regions.name: Near
regions.description: The near range at which the amiibo will want to be closer to the target

regions.name: Offensive
regions.description: Handles the offensive behaviors the amiibo is capable of using.

regions.name: Grounded
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to stay grounded.

regions.name: Attack Out Cliff
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to attack off the stage

regions.name: Dash
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to dash.

regions.name: Return To Cliff
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to return to ledge.

regions.name: Air Offensive
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to attack while in the air, such as when landing from high above.

regions.name: Cliffer
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should hang from ledge when edgeguarding

regions.name: Feint Master
regions.description: Handles the overall behavior of if the amiibo should choose to counter (lucina down b for instance). Also involves amiibo “dash dancing” to bait attacks; needs more research.

regions.name: Feint Counter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should counter a basic attack; needs more research.

regions.name: Feint Shooter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should counter a projectile; needs more research.

regions.name: Grab
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to grab.

regions.name: 100 Attacker
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should initiate a rapid jab.

regions.name: 100 Keeper
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should continue a rapid jab.

regions.name: Attack Cancel
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to cancel its jabs, such as doing 2 jabs and stopping.

regions.name: Smash Holder
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to charge a smash attack.

regions.name: Dash Attack
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to dash attack.

regions.name: Critical Hitter
regions.description: Unknown.

regions.name: Meteor Smasher
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should use moves that spike.

regions.name: Shield Master
regions.description: Handles the overall behavior of shielding.

regions.name: Just Shield Master
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to parry.

regions.name: Shield Grab
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should grab out of shield.

regions.name: Item Collector
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to collect an item.

regions.name: Item Throw To Target
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to throw an item at a target.

regions.name: Dragoon Collector
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to collect Dragoon parts.

regions.name: Smash Ball Collector
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to attack the smash ball.

regions.name: Hammer Collector
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to pick up the hammer item.

regions.name: Special Flagger
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to use the one-up flag.

regions.name: Item Swinger
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to attack with an item.

regions.name: Homerun Batter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to use the strong attack of the homerun bat.

regions.name: Club Swinger
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to use the strong attack of the Ore club.

regions.name: Death Swinger
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to use the strong attack of the Death scythe.

regions.name: Item Shooter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to shoot a shootable item.

regions.name: Carrier Breaker
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to stop carrying an item.

regions.name: Charger
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should charge a chargeable attack.

regions.name: Taunt
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to taunt.

regions.name: Advantageous Fighter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should target the winning player.

regions.name: Weaken Fighter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should target the weakest player.

regions.name: Revenge
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should target someone who recently killed them or their ally.

regions.name: Stage Enemy
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should target the stage boss/enemy.

regions.name: Forward Tilt
regions.description: Probability of a forward tilt occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Up Tilt
regions.description: Probability of an up tilt occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Down Tilt
regions.description: Probability of a down tilt occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.description: Probability of a forward smash occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Up Smash
regions.description: Probability of an up smash occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Down Smash
regions.description: Probability of a down smash occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Grounded Neutral Special
regions.description: Probability of a neutral special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Grounded Side Special
regions.description: Probability of a side special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Grounded Up Special
regions.description: Probability of an up special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Grounded Down Special
regions.description: Probability of a down special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use a grounded move.

regions.name: Forward Air
regions.description: Probability of a forward air occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Back Air
regions.description: Probability of a back air occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.description: Probability of an up air occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Down Air
regions.description: Probability of a down air occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Aerial Neutral Special
regions.description: Probability of a neutral special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Aerial Side Special
regions.description: Probability of a side special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Aerial Up Special
regions.description: Probability of an up special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Aerial Down Special
regions.description: Probability of a down special occurring when the Figure Player decides to offensively use an aerial move.

regions.name: Forward Air Dodge
regions.description: Probability of a forward air dodge occurring when the Figure Player decides to air dodge.

regions.name: Backward Air Dodge
regions.description: Probability of a backward air dodge occurring when the Figure Player decides to air dodge.

regions.name: Up Taunt
regions.description: Probability of an up taunt occurring when the Figure Player decides to taunt.

regions.name: Down Taunt
regions.description: Probability of an down taunt occurring when the Figure Player decides to taunt.
